definition: station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: The pit stop was my call.
Even race cars make pit stops.
sentences.chinese: 即使是賽車也需要停站。

sentences.english: Even on intermediate stops, stations are far from urban centres.
sentences.chinese: 即使在中途停站，高鐵車站也遠離城市中心。

sentences.english: Along the way, the train stopped many times to load up on coal.
sentences.chinese: 一路上，火車不時停站以便上煤。

sentences.english: Walk outdoors when the train stops to let passengers on and off.
sentences.chinese: 當火車停站乘客上下時可以出來走走。

sentences.english: Well, shall we get the luggage down before it stops?
sentences.chinese: 額，在停站之前我們應該把行李拿下了來嗎？

sentences.english: Train routing mode and stop schedule plan are key influence factors of transportation operation optimization.
sentences.chinese: 列車交路模式和停站方案是運輸組織優化的重要環節。

sentences.english: But then after the pit stop I noticed that I was able to catch Kovalainen.
sentences.chinese: 但是在停站後我發現我能夠超越科瓦萊寧。

sentences.english: but only to take on mail, not passengers.
sentences.chinese: 但它只停站裝郵件，不載旅客。

sentences.english: Other mechanics may make other adjustments during the stop.
sentences.chinese: 其他的技師則負責在停站時進行其它調整。

sentences.english: During my second stop we lost some time and that affected our finishing position.
sentences.chinese: 我第二次停站時損失了一些時間，影響了最終的排名。

sentences.english: One calls at Foshan and terminates at Zhaoqing with a total journey time of about 4 hours.
sentences.chinese: 一班於佛山停站，以肇慶爲終站，全程約需四小時。

sentences.english: Coach to Vegas with stop at factory outlet.
sentences.chinese: 乘旅遊車前往拉斯維加斯，中途停站於廠直銷店。

definition: departure (of a coach or train)/to dispatch a vehicle
train or coach service ("service" as in "they run 12 services per day between the two cities")
bus or tram stop/intermediate stop (on route of ship, plane etc)/port of call/stopover
power car/multiple-unit train (abbr. for 動車組|动车组)
(of trains etc) to set off (on a journey)/to start (being issued or circulated)/to start (happening)/originating
grade/class number (in school)/flight or run number/flight or run (seen as an item)/shift (work period)
terminus/final stop on rail or bus line
local bus or train/slow train with many stops
